info.name: Hippocampus, Ammon's horn
info.description: Ammon's horn of the hippocampus is AKA the hippocampus proper. It is one of two interlocking C-shaped gyri constituting the hippocampus. The dentate gyrus is the other. The hippocampus proper receives input from the dentate gyrus and septal nuclei, it projects to the subiculum and septal nuclei.
